1378260.name: Voodoo Kid
1378260.description:
Who'd have thought it? Who could possibly have imagined it? KID, a kid just like any other. A tired little boy reading his book. A tired little boy...so tired...

...then WIDE AWAKE. Wide awake and all alone. A prisoner of the unfriendly, unearthly Baron Saturday, king of the Zombies, master of Voodoo and lord of poor KID's shaky future.

Explore, solve and fight. And where that fails - RUN!

- Shudders and thrills guaranteed
- Puzzles and riddles to stimulate your imagination
- A humorous and atmospheric adventure
- Simple point-and-click interface
1378260.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
